Package com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.dto.core.io

Interfaces and supporting classes for reading and writing Fedora DTOs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ContentHandler Callback interface used to handle content if needed when inline managed content is encountered while reading a FedoraObject from a stream.
ContentResolver Callback interface used to resolve referenced content as needed while writing a FedoraObject to a stream.
DTOReader Interface for reading a FedoraObject from a stream.
DTOWriter Interface for writing a FedoraObject to a stream.
 

Class Summary
ContentHandlingDTOReader Base class for DTOReader implementations capable of handling content.
ContentResolvingDTOWriter Base class of DTOWriter implementations capable of resolving content.
DefaultContentHandler A ContentHandler that allocates files in a single local directory, using the filename pid + dsId + dsVersionId and sets the datastream contentLocation to a the corresponding file:/// URI.
DefaultContentResolver A ContentResolver that resolves http[s] and local file URIs.
XMLUtil XML reading and writing utility methods used by dto.core and available for external use.
 

Package com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.dto.core.io Description

Interfaces and supporting classes for reading and writing Fedora DTOs.
